page.title: 12Recreation in East Leicester
page.content: {Evington Swimming Pool:}The indoor pool at Evington is on Downing Dr. It was opened in 1975 and now has a staff of 19. Up to 250 people can use the pool at any one time & in the summer an average of 5000 people use the pool each week. For a one hour session adults are charged 60 pence,children 25p & senior citizens 15p. A wide range of activities are organised apart from learning to swim: canoeing snorkelling,mothers & babies etc. etc. Local schools can book sessions for their swimming classes. {Evington Park:}This park provides public facilities for football,tennis, hockey & cricket. Evington House which was built in about 1843 is used as a sports pavilion & meetings are sometimes held there by local societies. There is also a private bowls club in the park.
